quotes.text: I'm done hiding from bullies. I am taking this into the real world.
I'm so sick of people being mean on the internet. I think the anonymity makes everyone feel like they can say things they'd never say to your face.
You know, you had a theory. You wrote a paper. You made an actual contribution. All guys like this do is just tear down other people's work.
